user.title: Light Controller Setup
user.description: Configure default settings for the Light Controller. These can be changed later in the integration options.

data_description.default_brightness_pct: Default brightness percentage when not specified in service calls
data_description.default_transition: Default transition time in seconds for light changes

menu_options.defaults: Brightness & transition defaults for all commands
menu_options.tolerances: How strictly to verify lights reached target state
menu_options.retry: Max retries, delays, and timeout behavior

defaults.title: Default Settings
defaults.description: These values are used when not specified in service calls

data_description.default_brightness_pct: Brightness percentage (1-100%) applied to lights without explicit brightness
data_description.default_transition: Transition time in seconds for smooth light changes

tolerances.title: Verification Tolerances
tolerances.description: Higher tolerances are more forgiving of minor differences between target and actual state

data_description.brightness_tolerance: Allowed deviation in brightness (e.g., 3 means 47-53% passes for target 50%)
data_description.rgb_tolerance: Allowed deviation per RGB channel (0-255 scale)

retry.title: Retry & Timing Settings
retry.description: Controls behavior when lights don't immediately reach target state

data_description.delay_after_send: Wait time after sending commands before checking state
data_description.max_retries: Number of retry attempts before giving up
data_description.max_runtime_seconds: Hard timeout - abort after this time regardless of retries
data_description.use_exponential_backoff: Double the delay after each failed retry (2s, 4s, 8s...)
data_description.max_backoff_seconds: Cap on delay when using exponential backoff

notifications.title: Logging & Notifications
notifications.description: Configure success logging and failure alerts

data_description.log_success: Write to the Home Assistant logbook when lights reach target state
data_description.notify_on_failure: Service to call on failure (e.g., notify.mobile_app_phone)

add_preset.title: Add New Preset
add_preset.description: Presets store light settings and can be activated via service call or button entity

data_description.name: A unique name for this preset (e.g., Evening Ambiance)
data_description.entities: Select the lights to include in this preset
data_description.state: Whether lights should be turned on or off
data_description.color_temp_kelvin: Color temperature (leave empty for current or RGB color)
data_description.transition: Transition time in seconds when activating
data_description.skip_verification: Skip state verification (faster but won't retry on failure)

error.entities_required: At least one entity is required
error.no_presets: No presets configured. Use 'Add New Preset' to create one.

ensure_state.name: Ensure State
ensure_state.description: Ensure lights reach a target state with verification and retries

entities.name: Entities
entities.description: Light entities, light groups, or helper groups to control

state.name: State
state.description: Target state for the lights (on or off)

rgb_color.name: RGB Color
rgb_color.description: Default RGB color for all lights

delay_after_send.name: Delay After Send
delay_after_send.description: Wait time after commands before verification

activate_preset.name: Activate Preset
activate_preset.description: Activate a saved preset by name or ID

preset.name: Preset
preset.description: Name or ID of the preset (e.g., Evening Ambiance)

create_preset.name: Create Preset
create_preset.description: Create a new preset with specified settings

name.name: Preset Name
name.description: A unique name for this preset

preset_id.name: Preset ID
preset_id.description: ID of the preset (visible in button attributes)

create_preset_from_current.name: Create Preset from Current
create_preset_from_current.description: Create a preset from the current state of lights

name.name: Preset Name
name.description: A unique name for this preset

entities.name: Entities
entities.description: Light entities to capture state from
